snippet: Many people were missing and more than 1,800 were injured after an earthquake, with a reported magnitude of 6.5, hit Yunnan Province.
abstract: Powerful earthquake rocks mountainous region of Yunnan Province, China, killing at least 367 people and injuring more than 1,800 others; dozens remain missing and death toll is expected to rise.
lead_paragraph: Many people were missing and more than 1,800 were injured after an earthquake, with a reported magnitude of 6.5, hit Yunnan Province.

headline.main: Earthquake Kills Hundreds in Southwest China
headline.print_headline: Strong Quake Strikes China in Southwest; Hundreds Die
